title: Design of Digital Training Modules Based on Multimedia Learning Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and work experience in social studies-related roles
context.additional_context: Social sector job enhancement program for in-service professionals, requiring the establishment of a formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can explain over 80% of social sector job knowledge using multimedia provided in digital training modules.
Learners can analyze and execute complex job scenarios step-by-step through content applying segmentation principles.
Learners can extract core information with 90% accuracy from visual materials reflecting spatial proximity principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
